import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Navbar from "../pages/navbar" import Footer from "../pages/footer" import { Divider, Center, Input,FormControl,FormLabel,Flex,Button,CardFooter,Text,CardHeader,Heading,Card,CardBody,SimpleGrid,ButtonGroup,Stack,Image } from '@chakra-ui/react'; import styles from "../pages/hotel.module.css" function Hotel() { const [Place,setPlace]=useState(""); const [Checkin,setCheckin]=useState(""); const [Checkout,setCheckout]=useState(""); const [Adults,setAdults]=useState(0); const [Hotels,setHotels]=useState([]); async function handleSrch() { let obj={location:Place,checkin:Checkin,checkout:Checkout,adults:Adults} console.log(obj); const url = `https://airbnb13.p.rapidapi.com/search-location?location=${Place}&checkin=${Checkin}&checkout=${Checkout}&adults=${Adults}`; const options = { method: 'GET', headers: { 'X-RapidAPI-Key': 'f7f0139948mshae9d66e4aa3dc76p1d251cjsnd56e49e8f388', 'X-RapidAPI-Host': 'airbnb13.p.rapidapi.com' } }; try { const response = await fetch(url, options); const result = await response.json(); result.results.map((item)=> { return ` ${item.name} No. of beds: ${item.beds} No.of bathrooms:${item.bathrooms} $${item.price.total} Rating:${item.rating} ` }) } catch (error) { console.error(error); } } return
First name setPlace(e.target.value)} /> CheckIn setCheckin(e.target.value)} /> CheckOut setCheckout(e.target.value)}/> Number of Adults setAdults(e.target.value)}/>
Living room Sofa This sofa is perfect for modern tropical spaces, baroque inspired spaces, earthy toned spaces and for people who love a chic design with a sprinkle of vintage design. $450
; } export default Hotel;
